channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole on grass verge/pavement corner next to 3 College fields, 23rd February
item.description:
There is a large pot hole/hole on the grass verge(which serves as a pavement) next property 3 College Fields Longlevens GL2 0AG. The hole/dip is next to a drain which is now significantly protruding on one side. This is constantly driven over by school traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Fields, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes on Hatherley Road near laundry, 23rd February
item.description:
There are a number of dangerous potholes from Hatherley Brake and the laundry (going towards town) for several hundred metres. They have been there for more than a month. They are particularly dangerous as they are damaging cars and also forcing vehicles to slalom to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 217, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another fallen branch, 23rd February
item.description:
Further to the report lodged with you on 27th January - which has yet to be actioned - two more large branches fell into the front gardens of 14 and 16 Monica Drive in the high winds a couple of days ago. These have now been moved to where the other large fallen branch is awaiting collection. As you can see from the photo, I have pulled the original fallen branch off the pavement to remove the obstruction it was causing but the now growing amount of debris still needs to be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Monica Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
